Title: Datentransfer ERP Vendor Daten
Content:
Überträgt alle ERP Vendor Daten in dir topteam Firmen Tabelle.
-- =============================================
-- Author: Stefan Bätz, topfact AG
-- Create date: 14.10.2015
-- Description: Sync MD Vendor
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Sync_DMS_Vendor]
AS
BEGIN

SET NOCOUNT ON;

DECLARE
@erpid VARCHAR(50), 
@name nvarchar(100),
@group varchar(100),
@street  varchar(100),
@zip varchar(100),
@city varchar(100),
@country varchar(100),
@spec varchar(100),
@mandantid VARCHAR(10),
@status VARCHAR(100)

DECLARE @mid INT

DECLARE cur CURSOR FOR 
SELECT
ACCOUNTNUM, NAME, VENDGROUP, STREET, ZIPCODE, CITY, COUNTRYREGIONID, 2,
DATAAREAID, COMPANY_STATUS
FROM
[mssql.hq.tp.nil].[dax_2012r3_prod].[dbo].[VIEW_TRANSPOREON_DMS_VENDOR]
WHERE
ACCOUNTNUM IS NOT NULL OR LEN(ACCOUNTNUM)>0;

OPEN cur

FETCH NEXT FROM cur 
INTO @erpid,@name,@group,@street,@zip,@city,@country,@spec,@mandantid,@status

WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN

SELECT @mid = MandantID FROM tblMandant WHERE (Nummer = @mandantid);

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM topteam.dbo.tblFirma WHERE ERPID = @erpid)
BEGIN
UPDATE
topteam.dbo.tblFirma
SET
Name1 = @name, 
GroupName = @group, 
Strasse = @street, 
PLZ = @zip, 
Ort = @city, 
LKZ = @country, 
fk_tblFirmenspezifikation = @spec,
fk_tblFirmenStatus = (
CASE
WHEN @status = 'Free for all' THEN 1
WHEN @status = 'Blocked for all' THEN 2
ELSE NULL END),
MandantID = @mid,
DateModified = GETDATE()
WHERE
(ERPID = @erpid)

END
ELSE
BEGIN
INSERT INTO topteam.dbo.tblFirma
(ERPID, Suchwort, Name1, GroupName, Strasse, PLZ, Ort, LKZ, MandantID, 
fk_tblFirmenspezifikation, fk_tblFirmenStatus, DateInserted)
VALUES
(@erpid,@erpid,@name,@group,@street,@zip,@city,@country,@mandantid,
2,
CASE
WHEN @status = 'Free for all' THEN 1
WHEN @status = 'Blocked for all' THEN 2
ELSE NULL END,
GETDATE())

END

FETCH NEXT FROM cur 
INTO @erpid,@name,@group,@street,@zip,@city,@country,@spec,@mandantid,@status
END 
CLOSE cur;
DEALLOCATE cur;

END

GO
